summary: A medium-sized Dwemer themed player house. Complete with crafting areas, named storage, personal blacksmith, and new follower.
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=200]Bthardak 1.0[/size][/b]

[b][size=4]Description:[/size][/b]

Bthardak is a medium-sized, Dwemer-themed player house located west of Riverwood, and northwest of Anise's Cabin. The house contains three areas: an atrium, the living quarters, and the forge/armory. There is a quick access elevator directly to the living quarters, however, the first time you enter the house you have to go through the atrium. The quick access elevator key is located on the desk in the master bedroom (it looks like a lexicon).

The house contains named/custom storage containers for various different types of items in addition to standard containers. It also has an in-house blacksmith that wanders between the living quarters and the forge/armory and a housecarl follower.

[color=red][b][size=4]NOTE: This mod requires the Dawnguard, Hearthfire, and Dragonborn DLCs to function.[/size][/b][/color]

This is the first mod I made that I have uploaded to the Nexus. Critique and comments are welcome. I tested the mod as much as possible before posting it. If you find any bugs/issues please let me know so I can fix them.

[b][size=4]Amenities:[/size][/b]

The living quarters contains:
[list]
[*]3 Mannequins.
[*]6 Weapon racks.
[*]Cooking pot.
[*]Oven.
[*]Enchanting table.
[*]Alchemy table.
[*]Functional bookcase.
[*]Named/custom storage containers.
[*]Shrines.
[/list]
The forge/armory contains:
[list]
[*]12 Mannequins.
[*]12 Weapon racks.
[*]Functional dragon priest busts.
[*]Forge.
[*]Smelter.
[*]Workbench.
[*]Grinding stone.
[*]Tanning rack.
[*]Wood chopping block.
[*]Named/custom storage.
[/list]

[b][size=4]Installation/Uninstallation[/size][/b]

Either use the Nexus Mod Manager or for manual installation unzip the contents into your skyrim Data folder.

To manually install/uninstall place/delete the following files:

C:/Program Files (x86)/Steam/steamapps/common/Skyrim/Data/Bthardak 1_0.esp

[b][size=4]Known Compatibility Issues:[/size][/b]

Any mod that uses the same exterior location. Specific mods noted below.

[list]
[*]Zion's Arena: Partially clips into the entrance of the arena. Both are still accessible but might cause pathing/clipping issues. Screenshot provided by LordMalachi: https://flic.kr/p/ndbyiT
[*]Hanali Lunari Follower with In-game Body Changer: Shares location with the Hanali Temple. Both still accessible. Possible issues with pathing/clipping.
[/list]
